p: As shown in Table 1, thirteen compounds of the essential oil of Bursera morelensis were identified by GC–MS analysis which represented 100% of the total composition. The main compounds, which constituted a total of 75% of the peak area were the terpenes, namely γ-Terpinene (65.46%), β-Pellandrene (18.27%), α-Caryophyllene (5.13%) and α-Pinene (2.85%) ( Table 1).
